svg.text: Seven-Layer Stack from Infrastructure to Intelligence

g.text: Hardware foundation: GPUs, TPUs, cloud/on-prem servers
Edge computing for low-latency AI (e.g., autonomous vehicles)
Model serving, APIs, MLOps, and LangChain orchestration
Connects AI to business systems (e.g., chatbots, recommendation engines)
Real-time processing via GPUs/TPUs, distributed computing
Frameworks: TensorFlow, PyTorch, JAX, ONNX Runtime
Enhances decisions using RAG, knowledge graphs, vector search
Applications: GitHub Copilot, search engines, enterprise AI
Model training & optimization: CNNs, RNNs, Transformers
Transforms raw data: tokenization, embeddings (BERT, Word2Vec)
Feature engineering for NLP and computer vision applications
User-facing interfaces: ChatGPT, Bard, Claude, automation tools
Designed for intuitive interaction and workflow integration

svg.text: COLOR BREWER SCHEME: SEQUENTIAL MULTI-HUE | DIVERGING | QUALITATIVE
AI Architecture Visualization • Seven Critical Layers • Each Color Represents a Distinct Functional Domain
↓ DATA FLOW FROM INFRASTRUCTURE (LAYER 1) TO INTELLIGENCE (LAYER 7) ↑
